local_intent: Perceive white_plate, move above it, compute top grasp, and perform fine approach/alignment to prepare for pick
assumptions: White plate is within sensor view and reachable
No intervening obstacles between robot and white plate
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT segment: detection -> move above -> compute grasp -> approach; uses same targets, strategy, and timeouts consistent with GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION's conservative approach.
